default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Hello, my name is Jane. As you can see, I'm a Sinner. May I ask... Is this the place where Sinners come to look for work?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: If I become stronger, will I get a raise? If not, I may have to make another trip to the vault.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: You've done enough for me. The mistakes I've made... I must pay the price for them myself.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Finally... It's time to enjoy the fight...

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Hmph, so weak. Only a few shots, and it's over and done with.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Next time... next time... I swear I'll blast those Corruptors into a million pieces.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Goodbye and good riddance, reptiles.

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: This... is... my punishment...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Is there a suitable mission for me? Preferably a solo one.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Why do I use this kind of weapon? Because it's easy and efficient. I load a tailor-made grenade into the barrel, lock the rod into position, and aim to shoot. As simple as that.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: My family gave this bullet to me. They want me to be as unstoppable as a powerful bullet, capable of piercing any obstacle that stands in its way. Of course, it's also the last resort I keep for myself when I lose control.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Over the course of a mission, I can be a weapon, a tool, or anything else you want me to be, provided that it's legal and the pay is good.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: No matter how badly injured I am, I deserve it. It's part of my atonement for what I have done. You... you don't need to be so concerned about someone like me. I'll try my best to make everything right.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: What a psycho I am... Always finding satisfaction in violence and destruction. You must find me weird, right?

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Thanks to you and the MBCC, my family have returned to Eastside safely. I plan to visit them within the next few days. Wh-what?! You'd like to come with me?! I-isn't that a bit too soon...?

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: If I had been more rational at the time, would everything have turned out differently? Ah, here I go again, thinking about the what-ifs. I know it. For all the choices in the world, there are no what-ifs, only the results. But I'm lucky that, of all my choices, you are the most correct one.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Eight, nine, ten... These bullets should be enough. Hmm, it's better to err on the side of caution. I'll pack some more. It took quite some time to take down just one Fire Bather during my last mission.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: It tickles. Please don't do this when I need to concentrate.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Please keep your distance, even if you're curious...

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Any place other than a bank is fine with me.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: It was a bit easier than I'd expected.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: If only my bullets could grow more powerful along with me. Some Corruptors really have thick skins.

default.title: Join Team
default.text: Let me be clear, if you insist on putting me on the battlefield, I can't be held responsible if anything goes haywire.

off-duty_summer_civvies.title: Level Up
off-duty_summer_civvies.text: For sure, that's a pretty solid piece of work experience.

off-duty_summer_civvies.title: Obtain Attire
off-duty_summer_civvies.text: Pool security deployment complete. Next, I'll continue to provide security services by your side as an undercover guard, using the pretext of hanging laundry to maintain my cover.

off-duty_summer_civvies.title: Greeting
off-duty_summer_civvies.text: Patrol complete. No security concerns detected. You're free to enjoy the party to your heart's content.

off-duty_summer_civvies.title: Ordinary Contact 1
off-duty_summer_civvies.text: The best of disguise is to fully embrace your cover identity. Besides serving as your bodyguard chief, I've also taken on a swimsuit photography job for the supply office and a pool cleaning assignment at the hotel. If I can complete them all simultaneously, it should help pay off a significant portion of my previous debts.

off-duty_summer_civvies.title: Ordinary Contact 2
off-duty_summer_civvies.text: The hotel repair costs amounted to 350,000 DisCoins, and ammunition expenses total 50,000 DisCoins. So my payment for this operation is only... Huh? 500 DisCoins? Understood. I'll be more careful next time.

off-duty_summer_civvies.title: Idle
off-duty_summer_civvies.text: Good, another one taking care of. Hmm? I mean, another job completed.

off-duty_summer_civvies.title: Annoyed
off-duty_summer_civvies.text: Even though going on vacation is relaxing, please don't do that sort of thing when I'm trying to concentrate.

off-duty_summer_civvies.title: Special Attention
off-duty_summer_civvies.text: Chief, would you like to take a photo together? Any photos with you won't be sent to the supply office. I'll save them just for you.
